Original: Ah... that request. Do you see the
explorer preening at the table in the
corner? He is the client.
[Page]
He calls himself the lonely hunter
Dino. Wait... why does that title
of "lonely hunter" sound familiar?
[Page]
Well, no matter. I wonder if I am
mistaking him for another...? At any
rate, ask him for the details.
Translation: Ah... that request. Do you see the
explorer preening at the table in the
corner? He is the client.
[Page]
He calls himself the lonely hunter
Dino. Wait... why does that title
of "lonely hunter" sound familiar?
[Page]
Well, no matter. I wonder if I am
mistaking him for another...? At any
rate, ask him for the details.

Original: Ah, well done in finding the monster's
nest your client was looking for.
[Page]
And not only that, but you guessed
correctly as to the monster's diet?
Most impressive, [Guild] Guild.
[Page]
It is odd, though... I have serious
misgivings about this man. Look at
how he smiles at us...
Translation: Ah, well done in finding the monster's
nest your client was looking for.
[Page]
And not only that, but you guessed
correctly as to the monster's diet?
Most impressive, [Guild] Guild.
[Page]
It is odd, though... I have serious
misgivings about this man. Look at
how he smiles at us...

Original: As you investigate a remote spot in
search of a monster's nest, you spy
something scattered on the ground.
Translation: As you investigate a remote spot in
search of a monster's nest, you spy
something scattered on the ground.

Original: [Color:5]Land and investigate?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Land and investigate?[Color:0]

Original: Without knowing what dangers might
await you, it seems imprudent to
land your skyship here...
[Page]
Instead, you elect to observe from
the sky for a while.
Translation: Without knowing what dangers might
await you, it seems imprudent to
land your skyship here...
[Page]
Instead, you elect to observe from
the sky for a while.

Original: The objects scattered here seem to be
the remains of an [Color:5][Item:2079][Color:0]
and a [Color:5][Item:2085][Color:0].
[Page]
They were likely devoured by the
monster that dwells here.
Translation: The objects scattered here seem to be
the remains of an [Color:5][Item:2079][Color:0]
and a [Color:5][Item:2085][Color:0].
[Page]
They were likely devoured by the
monster that dwells here.

Original: This is unmistakably some sort of
nest, but its owner is nowhere to be
seen. You see no choice but to leave.
Translation: This is unmistakably some sort of
nest, but its owner is nowhere to be
seen. You see no choice but to leave.

Original: Coupled with the coordinates you
received, you are certain that this
is the nest the client sought.
[Page]
All you need now is to report these
coordinates verbatim along with the
monster's diet to the client.
Translation: Coupled with the coordinates you
received, you are certain that this
is the nest the client sought.
[Page]
All you need now is to report these
coordinates verbatim along with the
monster's diet to the client.

Original: The half-eaten remains of an
[Color:5][Item:2079][Color:0] and a
[Color:5][Item:2085][Color:0] are left here.
[Page]
You should report this location and
the food strewn about here back to
your client at the bar...
Translation: The half-eaten remains of an
[Color:5][Item:2079][Color:0] and a
[Color:5][Item:2085][Color:0] are left here.
[Page]
You should report this location and
the food strewn about here back to
your client at the bar...
